title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: It is said that imitation is a sincere form of flattery, and that may be true even if you set your standards higher. A trait that you admire so much in someone else is very likely one that you possess yourself. In fact, this similarity could be the very heart of the reason for your attraction in the first place. Fortunately, you are unique in the expression of your talents, cleverness, and courage. Follow another persons wonderful example as far as it can take you, but never doubt that you radiate a special shine thats all your own. Albert Einstein said, Be a voice, not an echo. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
